pageContent: Objectives: To present a pilot study of laparoscopic unilateral sural nerve grafting during radical prostatectomy, with the aim of preserving sexual potency.

metaData.source:
Biochemical outcome after high-dose-rate intensity modulated brachytherapy with external beam radiotherapy: 12 years of experience
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/21981583/
